tool_description: Ethereum graphql api to get swap, transaction, block data with ease
name: Ethereum swaps  transaction data
title: Ethereum swaps  transaction data

api_list.name: graphQL
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ethereum-swaps-transaction-data.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ethereum-swaps-transaction-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://ethereum-swaps-transaction-data.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ethereum-swaps-transaction-data.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
